api_data.job_title: OPENING FOR(TOURS AND TRAVEL)FOR PRODUCT AND CONTRACTING..MUMBAI (INTERNATIONAL)

jd_information.description: TALENT HUNTERS ARE HIRING FOR TOURS AND TRAVEL COMPANYPosition:-Product & ContractingTotal Experience:- min 2 - 5 yrs BASIC REQUIREMENT: · Target domestic corporate selling and marketing major events like Meetings, Incentives, Conference and Exhibition MICE· Must have Knowledge in Domestic Destination· Must have Knowledge in COSTING and NEGOTIATING rates with SUPPLIERS· Discuss clients’ requirements and provide advice on worldwide destinations, tours, accommodation and flights by understanding the clients’ interest and purpose of visit.· Designed attractive travel ITINERARIES for clients· Good knowledge of TOURSIM MARKETING technique to encourage destination travel· Excellent Social and Interpersonal Skills with pleasant Personality· Proficiency in Microsoft WORD, EXCEL AND POWERPOINT.· Ability to manage TRAVEL PLANS and ORGANISE task systematic effective ADMINISTRATION and MANAGERIAL skills.· Conducting research according to the requirements of the client.  IF YOU FIND THIS JOB SUITABLE TO CAN SEND ME YOUR CV ON THE GIVEN EMAIL ID hr.thms123@gmail.com/singhpink924@gmail.com or you can call me on this number 9867311024Regards,PinkyTalent Hunters
